author: DevelopmentCats
install_msg: Thanks for installing the AIResponder cog! Use `[p]help AIResponder` to see available commands. Bot owner should configure the cog using `[p]airesponder` commands before use.
name: AIResponder
short: An advanced AI responder using the DeepInfra API with Llama 3.2 Vision/Instruct model.
description: This cog allows the bot to respond to mentions using an AI-powered response generated by the DeepInfra API with Llama 3.2 Vision/Instruct model. It supports channel-specific enabling/disabling and various configuration options.
